summary: Frontend-only testing completed for UI changes. All 6 features verified working correctly: Landing page hero text, features section, pricing tiers, billing toggle, and Settings page subscription badge for Club Plan users.

landing_page_hero.details: Hero text correctly shows 'Develop Your Coaches.' in black (text-slate-900) and 'Simple.' in blue (text-blue-600)

landing_page_features.details: Features section shows 3 updated cards: 'Observe Sessions', 'Build Coach Portfolios', 'Support Development'

pricing_tier_names.details: Pricing tiers correctly named: Individual, Developer, Club

pricing_coach_counts.details: Coach counts correct: Individual=5, Developer=15, Club=50. Club has 10 coach developers.

billing_toggle.details: Monthly is default (toggle unchecked). '2 months free' badge always visible regardless of toggle state.

settings_subscription_badge.details: QPR Academy (org_4b76a7344640) shows 'Club Plan' badge in emerald/green color. No upgrade option shown for Club tier users.

context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI changes from the request verified working. Registration T&C checkboxes not tested (requires invite URL not available in test environment). QPR Academy correctly shows Club Plan badge without upgrade option.

notes.registration_tc_not_tested: Per review request note, registration T&C testing requires an invite URL which is not available in test environment
notes.login_note: Sign In button click alone doesn't work - form submission via Enter key required for successful login
